item.title: Master's thesis
item.description: markup: mmark KAM theory for properly-degenerate system Hamiltonian function is of the following form $$ H(I, \varphi, p, q; \mu) := H_0(I) + \mu f(I, \varphi, p, q) $$ whose phase space is \begin{equation} \mathcal{P} := V \times \mathbb{T}^{n_1} \times B^{2n_2} \end{equation} where \( V \) is an open, bounded and connected subset of \( \mathbb{R}^{n_1}\), and \( (I, \varphi) \in V \times \mathbb{T}^{n_1}\), \(B^{2n_2} \subset \mathbb{R}^{2n_2} \) is a ball around the origin, and \( (p,q) \in B^{2n_2} \).

#Hugo for my website config.toml is the configuration file. change the folder to the blog folder In cmd (MyBlog folder), input ‘hugo’ to generate the static webpages. then in the public folder, all contents should be added to github.io git add . git commit -m "" git push origin master references: https://w01fb0ss.github.io/2020/010/; https://keysaim.github.io/post/blog/2017-08-15-how-to-setup-your-github-io-blog/ https://keysaim.github.io/post/blog/deploy-hugo-blog-in-github.io/
